channel.title: Client?
channel.description:
ok well i download a client and it asks for the server like this:
username: password: server:
this is miss sailbsofts. So i typed in 127.0.0.1 into the server and it dident work so i tried 0.0.0.0 and it dident work...what should i do? Im confused! Please help! :confused: :| :eek:

item.title: Client?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“i0wnuall, post:3, topic:141249”]ok but i donwload a client…and i want to use it… how i get on it?[/quote]Just play on a server…run the client, type a username and password desired, and for the server type an ip to play. Same as moparscape client, just using a different client that holds skillcapes and more.

Read full topic

item.title: Client?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

127.0.0.1 is your localhost. Obviously you aren’t running a server with the port 43594, so that’s pointless. Try using the server status page and log in on a server from there.

Read full topic
